name: anisette-js
description: High-level JavaScript/TypeScript API for Apple Anisette headers via WASM

scripts.build: bun build src/index.ts --outfile dist/anisette.js --target node --format esm --minify
scripts.build:cjs: bun build src/index.ts --outfile dist/anisette.cjs --target node --format cjs --minify
